title: IMS Learning Design-Based Integrated Mathematics Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customized workshops for pre-service and in-service elementary teachers to strengthen mathematics lesson design capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can design math lesson scenarios integrated with external web tools by applying IMS Learning Design principles
Learners can propose automated instructional flow adjustments using bidirectional integration features of LMS and Web 2.0 tools
Learners can ensure reusability and interoperability when designing math learning activities by applying service integration extension models
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
